metadata.title: DPM exchange Eid Greetings with Turkiye FM, pray for well-being of Palestinians, Ummah

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 7 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday exchanged Eid-ul-Azha greetings with his Turkish counterpart and prayed for peace and well-being of the Palestinian people and the entire Ummah. The deputy prime minister held a telephone conversation with Foreign Minister of Turkiye, Hakan Fidan, a DPM's Office news release said.
